page.title: 04SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: QUESTIONNAIRES REVEALED THAT PEOPLE WERE CONCERNED ABOUT THE LACK OF RECREATIONAL LAND IN SELLYOAK,THE AMOUNT OF LITTER,THE INCREASE IN BURGLARIES IN THE NORTHFIELD AREA AND THE LARGE NUMBER OF TEENAGERS LOITERING ON THE STREETS.UNEMPLOYMENT WAS SUGGESTED BY SOME ADULTS AS THE CAUSE OF VANDALISM AND THE INCREASE IN LOITER ING. MORE POLICEMEN ON THE BEAT WAS SUGGESTED BY SOME AS A MEANS OF COMBAT ING SOME OF THESE PROBLEMS. THE AMOUNT OF OPEN SPACE IN NORTHFIELD AND BOURNVILLE WAS PRAISED ALTHOUGH CONCERN WAS EXPRESSED ABOUT THE BUILD- ING ON RECREATIONAL LAND.IT WAS POINT- ED OUT THAT SUCH BUILDING MAY BE CONT- RARY TO THE WISHES OF GEORGE CADBURY, THE ESTATE'S INSTIGATOR,AND THE WISH OF PROPERTY OWNERS.
